text: @narendramodi Bhairav Science Research Centre West Champaran Bihar make in India Ministry of Defence is Samay DRDO Ne Jo suit Banaya Coronavirus Se Ladne Ke Liye (3) Kilo Gram Ki Oxygen Cylinder Sut Ke Sathe Setting Hone Se Doctor Ko Corona Patient Ke Sathe Elaaj Karne Me Achha Kargar Sabit
